p.a: Visit our Athletics website for game calendars, scores, and updates from our Sussex Tech student-athletes.

a.p: Visit our calendar of events to find out about special events, holidays and breaks, testing dates, and more. Stay up-to-date by checking back regularly as new events are added!
Sussex County 8th-graders can apply for admission to Sussex Tech through January 8. Find out more about our random, anonymous lottery system and admissions process here.

Find out about our and training programs for adult learners to improve their education and advance in their careers. Opportunities include health careers, apprenticeships, ESL, high school diplomas, and more.
